mapper.select: SELECT p.prc_id, p.PROCESS_NAME, g.gid AS g_id, g.sku_name AS g_goodsName, g.sku AS g_goodsCode FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON p.prc_id = pg.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE p.prc_id = pg.prc_id

SELECT p.prc_id, p.process_name,
g.gid AS g_id, g.sku_name AS g_goodsName, g.sku AS g_goodsCode FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON p.prc_id = pg.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE p.process_name = #{processName}
SELECT prc_id id, process_name FROM gds_process

SELECT g.gid id, g.sku_name goods_name, g.COVER_IMAGE_URI, g.GOODS_UNIT, g.GOODS_SPECIFICATION, gp.vip_price, gp.RETAIL_PRICE, gb.BRAND_CODE, gc.CATEGORY_CODE, gt.TYPE_CODE FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON pg.prc_id = p.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_brand gb ON gb.brd_id = g.brd_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods_category gc ON gc.cid = g.cid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_type gt ON gt.gtid = g.gtid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_price gp ON gp.gid = g.gid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON s.store_id = gp.store_id LEFT JOIN emp_employee e ON e.store_id = s.store_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId} AND p.prc_id = #{processId}

SELECT g.gid id, g.sku_name goods_name, g.COVER_IMAGE_URI, g.GOODS_UNIT, g.GOODS_SPECIFICATION, gp.vip_price, gp.RETAIL_PRICE, gb.BRAND_CODE, gc.CATEGORY_CODE, gt.TYPE_CODE FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON pg.prc_id = p.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_brand gb ON gb.brd_id = g.brd_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods_category gc ON gc.cid = g.cid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_type gt ON gt.gtid = g.gtid LEFT JOIN gds_goods_price gp ON gp.gid = g.gid LEFT JOIN st_store s ON s.store_id = gp.store_id LEFT JOIN cus_customer c ON c.store_id = s.store_id WHERE c.cus_id = #{userId} AND p.prc_id = #{processId}
